title: RuneScape: Original Soundtrack Classics

properties.name: description
properties.value: RuneScape: Original Soundtrack Classics is a compilation of several Old School RuneScape tracks available on CD, vinyl, and via digital streaming. 19 tracks are not available on vinyl and are received digitally instead.[3] CD and vinyl copies automatically come with a full digital download version.[4] The vinyl issue was re-released in April 2021 on gold vinyl.[5]

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:RuneScape - Original Soundtrack Classics
RuneScape: Original Soundtrack Classics
Release date 14 September 2018
Artists Ian Taylor, Adam Bond[1]
Format(s) • Vinyl
• Compact Disc
• Digital (Downloadable, Streaming)
Label Laced Records
Genre Instrumental
Retail price EUR: €33 (Vinyl) • €14 (CD)
USD: $35 (Vinyl) • $15 (CD)[2]
Streaming platforms
    

RuneScape: Original Soundtrack Classics is a compilation of several Old School RuneScape tracks available on CD, vinyl, and via digital streaming. 19 tracks are not available on vinyl and are received digitally instead.[3] CD and vinyl copies automatically come with a full digital download version.[4] The vinyl issue was re-released in April 2021 on gold vinyl.[5]

Contents

  • 1 Tracklist
  • 2 Specification
  • 3 Credits
  • 4 Gallery
  • 5 Trivia
  • 6 References

Specification[edit | edit source]

Format Specifications
Vinyl
  • 2 x 12" vinyl
  • 33 rpm
  • 180 gram
  • Red opaque vinyl
  • Gold vinyl (2021 reissue)
  • Gatefold sleeve
  • .mp3 digital download
Compact Disc
  • 2 x Compact Disc
  • Stereo
  • Gatefold sleeve
  • .mp3 digital download
Digital
  • .mp3 file format
  • Stereo

Credits[edit | edit source]

  • Music by - Ian Taylor, Adam Bond (Digital and CD only, tracks: 36 & 37)
  • Producer - Stephen Lord
  • Artwork by - Jagex Ltd
  • Copyright © - Jagex Ltd
  • Phonographic Copyright ℗ - Jagex Ltd
  • Licensed to - Laced Music Ltd
  • Manufactured by - Optimal Media GmbH

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • Artwork for physical releases.

  • Artwork for digital releases.

  • Newspost image showing off the vinyl set.

  • Vinyl spread.

  • Compact Disc spread.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The physical release gatefolds use an original piece of art depicting Crunchy on the front. On the inside the remastered version of the classic Tim and Crunchy wallpaper, created as part of Old School RuneScape's 5th birthday event, is used.
    • The digital release uses the cropped version of the Tim and Crunchy wallpaper as its artwork.
  • Each record has an image of a character from the wallpaper in the centre; Crunchy on 1A, Tim on 1B, Eski on 2A, and Bob the cat on 2B.
    • The compact disc release instead shows Crunchy on disc 1, and Tim on disc 2.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Adam Bond is only credited for tracks 36: Work Work Work, and 37: Fe Fi Fo Fum on the digital and cd releases.
  2. ^ Laced Records. (Archived from the original on 13 October 2019.) “RuneScape: Original Soundtrack Classics (Deluxe Double Vinyl & Digital Download) £33.00, RuneScape: Original Soundtrack Classics (Double CD & Digital Download) £14.00”*
  3. ^ Jagex. "RuneScape Soundtrack Release". 13 September 2018. (Archived from the original.) Old School RuneScape News.
  4. ^ Laced Records. RuneScape: Original Soundtrack Classics (Double CD & Digital Download). (Archived from the original on 13 October 2019.) “includes a digital download of the full soundtrack.”*
  5. ^ Laced Records. RuneScape: Original Soundtrack Classics (Deluxe Double VInyl & Digital Download). (Archived from the original on 14 June 2021.)*

RuneScape- Original Soundtrack Classics (Laced Records CD spread).jpg|Compact Disc spread. ==Trivia== *The physical release gatefolds use an original piece of art depicting [[Crunchy]] on the front. On the inside the remastered version of the classic [[Tim]] and Crunchy wallpaper, created as part of ''[[Old School RuneScape]]'''s [[2018 Birthday event|5th birthday event]], is used. **The digital release uses the cropped version of the Tim and Crunchy wallpaper as its artwork. *Each record has an image of a character from the wallpaper in the centre; [[Crunchy]] on 1A, [[Tim]] on 1B, [[Eski]] on 2A, and [[Bob (cat)|Bob the cat]] on 2B. **The compact disc release instead shows Crunchy on disc 1, and Tim on disc 2. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Music}} {{Restricted title|Subject begins with "RuneScape:", which would place it in the wrong namespace; displaytitle used instead}} [[Category:Official merchandise]]
